H0.text: Which French author wrote the fairy tales ‘Little Red Riding Hood’ ‘Sleeping Beauty’ and ‘Puss in Boots’. Madame de La Fayette

H1.text: Which French author wrote the fairy tales ‘Little Red Riding Hood’ ‘Sleeping Beauty’ and ‘Puss in Boots’. Voltaire

H2.text: Which French author wrote the fairy tales ‘Little Red Riding Hood’ ‘Sleeping Beauty’ and ‘Puss in Boots’. Jean de La Fontaine

H3.text: Which French author wrote the fairy tales ‘Little Red Riding Hood’ ‘Sleeping Beauty’ and ‘Puss in Boots’. C. Perrault

A4.text: The best known of his tales include 'Little Red Riding Hood', 'Cinderella', 'Puss in Boots', 'Sleeping Beauty', and 'Bluebeard'.

A5.text: He ornamented his folktale subject matter with details, asides and subtext drawn from the world of fashion.
